issue.body: This is a test case to showcase the problem in #3329

issue.title: Spork sometimes drops the type access on static field reads

repository.name: spork
repository.description: AST-based structured merge tool for Java, fully Git compatible https://doi.org/10.1109/TSE.2022.3143766

issue.body:
See inria/spoon#3329

This causes build failures when for example replaying the merges inria/spoon@717488384e68298418156ef3a59034760416c4c2, inria/spoon@cf9c108b5c42845c67e60f5ee99d9d74d85e6b6d and inria/spoon@134fe1c2fdb2917fe37d9a6370dc083113d4a3bd

rename.from: Statically accessed variables sometimes get target as CtThisAccess instead of CtTypeAccess (noclasspath)
rename.to: Static field access sometimes get target as CtThisAccess instead of CtTypeAccess (noclasspath)

issue.title: fix: fix missing CtTypeAccess reported in #3329

repository.name: spoon
repository.description: Spoon is a metaprogramming library to analyze and transform Java source code. :spoon: is made with :heart:, :beers: and :sparkles:. It parses source files to build a well-designed AST with powerful analysis and transformation API.

body:
After some research, I figured out that despite being in noclasspath mode spoon still loads `spoon.Launcher` class from classloader:
https://github.com/INRIA/spoon/blob/1de9318fcb97fa99ba18c3fd40025163a55df89b/src/main/java/spoon/support/compiler/jdt/JDTImportBuilder.java#L150-L154

The thing is there is no `logger` field in `spoon.Launcher`, there is `LOGGER`, so this drives it a bit crazy.
You can try renaming it to `LOGGER` or replacing `import spoon.Launcher` with `import abc.Launcher` or something to see it yourself.
Anyway, I provided a PR with a possible fix for this corner case.
Thanks a lot to @slarse for the detailed bug report and to @Egor18 for the super fast analysis & fix!

issue.title: chore: release of 8.2.0

repository.name: spoon
repository.description: Spoon is a metaprogramming library to analyze and transform Java source code. :spoon: is made with :heart:, :beers: and :sparkles:. It parses source files to build a well-designed AST with powerful analysis and transformation API.

issue.body:
Changelog of 8.2.0
=========


# New features

* Add method to add new CompilationUnits to be pretty-printed. (PR: #3411)
* Add CtVariable#isPartOfJointDeclaration. (PR: #3392)
* Add notNullable property for processor properties. (PR: #3342)
* Add support for java 14 switch/yield. (PR: #3314)
* SameFilter: Add utility class SameFilter. (PR: #3391)


# Bug fixes

* Unqualified static method calls should be implicit. (PR: #3371)
* Sniper of local variables with joint declarations. (PR: #3398)
* Use input classloader for import resolution. (PR: #3454)
* Fix duplicate imports in sniper mode. (PR: #3388)
* Qualified name in catch clause resolved incorrectly (noclasspath). (PR: #3373)
* Fix type member ordering. (PR: #3421)
* Ensure unqualified member access remains unqualified. (PR: #3364)
* Rename refactoring impacts compilation units as well. (PR: #3413)
* Fix dropping diamonds on constructor calls. (PR: #3362)
* Sort type references by position and qualified name (may be BREAKING). (PR: #3355)
* Sniper of local variables. (PR: #3412)
* Remove incorrect implicitness for package reference. (PR: #3357)
* Correct package assumption when there is a star import. (PR: #3338)
* Fix sniper-mode after type rename. (PR: #3418)
* Fix wrong import on annotated parameter #3320. (PR: #3341)
* Fix nested class field read problem. (PR: #3335)
* Fix missing CtTypeAccess reported in #3329. (PR: #3331)
* CtFieldImpl: Fix regression in isPartOfJointDeclaration. (PR: #3416)
* JDTCommentBuilder: Crashing condition in cleanComment. (PR: #3382)
* PositionBuilder: Position of annotations on type reference are included in parent position. (PR: #3359)
* SniperPrettyPrinter: Fix pretty-printing of joint declarations  (#3387). (PR: #3387)
* SpoonPom: GetSourceVersion should not throw exceptions. (PR: #3346)


# Documentation

* Unify headers. (PR: #3379)
* Add supported java versions. (PR: #3375)
* Clarify readme + fix javadoc. (PR: #3378)


# Refactoring

* Remove unnecessary DirectPrinterHelper. (PR: #3425)
* Further simplify sniper mode. (PR: #3419)
* Change positions of fields. (PR: #3393)
* Simplify sniper code in ElementSourceFragment#addChild. (PR: #3415)
* Simpler exception chain. (PR: #3414)
* Clarify the position code + prepare field position change. (PR: #3408)
* Better API for creating ElementSourceFragment from a CtElement. (PR: #3405)
* ElementSourceFragment: Improve clarity. (PR: #3390)
* SniperPrettyPrinter: Introduce ModificationStatus for better readability. (PR: #3396)
* sniper: Only isFragmentModified is responsible for computing fragment modification. (PR: #3403)


# Tests

* Add test for ImportScannerImpl. (PR: #3423)
* SniperJavaPrettyPrinter: Add javax related error  (#3324). (PR: #3324)
* SniperPrettyPrinter
  * Modification on first statement of a block should not remove new line  (#3402). (PR: #3402)
  * Test replacement of invocation  (#3400). (PR: #3400)
* UnresolvedBugTest: Do not override the content of testMethods. (PR: #3351)


# Other

* deps
  * Update dependency gradle to v6. (PR: #3470)
  * Update dependency org.apache.commons:commons-lang3 to v3.11. (PR: #3496)
  * Update dependency org.mockito:mockito-core to v3.4.2. (PR: #3497)
  * Update dependency org.mockito:mockito-core to v3.4.0. (PR: #3490)
  * Update dependency org.revapi:revapi-java to v0.21.2. (PR: #3492)
  * Update dependency org.revapi:revapi-reporter-text to v0.11.1. (PR: #3493)
  * Update dependency org.revapi:revapi-java to v0.21.1. (PR: #3464)
  * Update dependency org.revapi:revapi-maven-plugin to v0.11.5. (PR: #3465)
  * Update dependency se.patrikerdes.use-latest-versions:se.patrikerdes.use-latest-versions.gradle.plugin to v0.2.14. (PR: #3467)
  * Update dependency org.jacoco:jacoco-maven-plugin to v0.8.5. (PR: #3457)
  * Update dependency org.jgrapht:jgrapht-core to v0.9.2. (PR: #3459)
  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.wagon:wagon-ssh to v3. (PR: #3477)
  * Update dependency org.junit.vintage:junit-vintage-engine to v5.6.2. (PR: #3461)
  * Update dependency org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-engine to v5.6.2. (PR: #3460)
  * Update dependency com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind to v2.11.1. (PR: #3479)
  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-source-plugin to v3. (PR: #3476)
  * Update dependency org.codehaus.mojo:exec-maven-plugin to v3. (PR: #3480)
  * Update dependency gradle to v6.5.1. (PR: #3487)
  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-dependency-plugin to v3. (PR: #3474)
  * Update dependency org.apache.commons:commons-compress to v1.20. (PR: #3437)
  * Update dependency org.mockito:mockito-core to v3.3.3. (PR: #3463)
  * Update dependency org.revapi:revapi-reporter-text to v0.11.0. (PR: #3466)
  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-assembly-plugin to v2.6. (PR: #3441)

  * Update dependency gradle to v5.6.4. (PR: #3433)

  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-dependency-plugin to v2.10. (PR: #3444)
  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin to v3.8.1. (PR: #3443)
  * Update dependency junit:junit to v4.13. (PR: #3436)
  * Update dependency com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind to v2.11.0. (PR: #3427)
  * Update dependency org.apache.commons:commons-lang3 to v3.10. (PR: #3438)
  * Update dependency org.apache.logging.log4j:log4j-api to v2.13.3. (PR: #3439)
  * Update dependency org.apache.logging.log4j:log4j-to-slf4j to v2.13.3. (PR: #3440)
  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-deploy-plugin to v2.8.2. (PR: #3445)
  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-gpg-plugin to v1.6. (PR: #3446)
  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-jar-plugin to v3.2.0. (PR: #3447)
  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-javadoc-plugin to v3.2.0. (PR: #3448)
  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-release-plugin to v2.5.3. (PR: #3449)
  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-source-plugin to v2.4. (PR: #3450)
  * Update dependency com.github.stefanbirkner:system-rules to v1.19.0. (PR: #3429)
  * Update dependency commons-io:commons-io to v2.7. (PR: #3431)
  * Update dependency fr.inria.gforge.spoon:spoon-core to v7.6.0. (PR: #3432)
  * Update dependency io.github.interacto:interacto-javafx to v3.4. (PR: #3434)
  * Update dependency com.github.ben-manes.versions:com.github.ben-manes.versions.gradle.plugin to v0.28.0. (PR: #3428)
  * Update dependency ch.qos.logback:logback-classic to v1.2.3. (PR: #3426)
  * Update dependency org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-surefire-plugin to v2.22.2. (PR: #3451)
  * Update dependency com.github.ben-manes.versions:com.github.ben-manes.versions.gradle.plugin to v0.29.0. (PR: #3498)
  * Update jackson-databind to 2.9.10.4. (PR: #3348)
  * Update cfr to version 0.149. (PR: #3347)
